cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
*Age restriction 18-35 yrs old only*
This deluxe mixed dorm has brand new bunk beds with your own privacy curtains and reading light, 2 of your own personal security lockers, full air conditioning / heating, full en-suite bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
*Age restriction 18-35 yrs old only*
This deluxe female only dorm has brand new bunk beds with your own privacy curtains and reading light, 2 of your own personal security lockers, full air conditioning / heating, full en-suite bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
